name: Kyubu Kyubu Dice
description:
Note: Be sure to activate Full-Screen mode as the game is currently set at a 1920x1080 screen resolution.

Kyubu Kyubu Dice is an Action Puzzle Game featuring Teresa-chan, the witch girl. She is responsible of solving the puzzles that roam the "Kyubu Kyubu Island", using her magical necklace known as "Kyubu Kyubu Dice"! With her powers she must uncover the secrets of this mysterious place!

Inspired by classic japanese puzzle games, Kyubu Kyubu Dice challenges you to think about objects in different spatially oriented ways. By rolling the "Kyubu" the player must clear the panels that appear on the stage, but beware! As the game progresses, the panels spawn faster and faster! It can soon get quite frenetic!

With an intricate Combo Chain System, skilled players can make the most of their playthroughs making sure that each session never stays the same in this fast-paced puzzle experience.

As a solo developer I really hope you get to enjoy this game, I have bigger plans for this project and I hope this can be a game that puzzle fans can enjoy and have good time with.

THE GAME MOSTLY USES PRE-EXISTING CODE AND ART, all done by me. The japanese voice acting is done by Yuuki Yashiro. For more information, please check the "Credits" section in the Settings Menu. Please keep in mind that all the UI Menus are controlled with the mouse input.

Thank you for playing! You are the best!
